descriptionHtml:
Not my English native language. Therefore I apologize for possible difficulties.

It very much, very small mod. It does not add to music from Skyrim of anything new, only does little changes as a path.
Namely - interchanges the position of Mus_explore_day_06 and mus_explore_day_01.
Or completely replaces mus_explore_day_01 with mus_explore_day_06 if you, as well as I am irritated already by sad mus_explore_day_01.

I considered vanilla archive of music in Skyrim recently.
I was shocked, I do not remember path mus_explore_day_06.
It seems to me that I never heard it. O_O
It is ridiculous.
For me, it is associated with the game "Black Desert Online", than from Skyrim more. Though it is an original track from the Skyrim.
But... This track is matchless!!! I want to hear it in Skyrim!!!

Yesterday I opened a subject who asked people - I only who never heard this song earlier?
And 50% of people told that they too never heard it in the Skyrim...

To listen to the song in video to understand - about what tracks I speak. If you the ardent supporter of Vanilla of music if you want to hear more often in Skyrim, this of fashions for you.

 Installation:
 Place contents of archive (Data folder) in your folder with game, confirm merge
 of folders, replacement of files (if already changed music in the Skyrim)
author: Vincent
